profile.questionnaire_subtitle: The public part of the profile that is visible to all users of the site
profile.passport_subtitle: Passport information so that users trust you. No one will see your passport details
profile.preview_subtitle: You can view the public view of your profile

passport.title: Creating an application for confirmation of passport data

user.image_info: You need to attach a photo of the main page of your passport.
user.video_info: You need to record a video with your passport. Your face and next to it the open main page of the passport. The duration of the video must be at least 5 seconds.

caution.text: The limit for creating works in the portfolio has been reached. You can create up to 10 works.

advice.header: You can create up to 10 works in your portfolio.

form.name: Name of the project
form.name_placeholder: Enter the name of the project
form.description_placeholder: Describe the complexities and nuances of the project
form.address_placeholder: Select the address where the object is located

type_hint.service: By service - the type of project that requires workers for each individual service.
type_hint.complex: Complex - a type of project that requires one contractor to perform all services and work on the project.
type_hint.permanent: Required for permanent work - a type of project that requires workers for permanent work on a specific service.
